ADDRESS_CITY.description: Convenience key to use with an address entry in Contacts.Contact . To get the city name in the first address of a Contact.Contact called 'myContact', use myContact.address[0].value[ADDRESS_CITY].
ADDRESS_CITY.name: ADDRESS_CITY

ADDRESS_COUNTRY.description: Convenience key to use with an address entry in Contacts.Contact . To get the country name in the first address of a Contact.Contact called 'myContact', use myContact.address[0].value[ADDRESS_COUNTRY].
ADDRESS_COUNTRY.name: ADDRESS_COUNTRY

ADDRESS_COUNTRY_CODE.description: Convenience key to use with an address entry in Contacts.Contact . To get the country code in the first address of a Contact.Contact called 'myContact', use myContact.address[0].value[ADDRESS_COUNTRY_CODE].
ADDRESS_COUNTRY_CODE.name: ADDRESS_COUNTRY_CODE

ADDRESS_POSTAL_CODE.description: Convenience key to use with an address entry in Contacts.Contact . To get the postal code in the first address of a Contact.Contact called 'myContact', use myContact.address[0].value[ADDRESS_POSTAL_CODE]. Identical to ADDRESS_ZIP.
ADDRESS_POSTAL_CODE.name: ADDRESS_POSTAL_CODE

ADDRESS_PROVINCE.description: Convenience key to use with an address entry in Contacts.Contact . To get the province name in the first address of a Contact.Contact called 'myContact', use myContact.address[0].value[ADDRESS_PROVINCE]. Identical to ADDRESS_STATE.
ADDRESS_PROVINCE.name: ADDRESS_PROVINCE

ADDRESS_SECONDARY_REGION.description: Convenience key to use with an address entry in Contacts.Contact . This field is used by only a few countries. To get the region name in the first address of a Contact.Contact called 'myContact', use myContact.address[0].value[ADDRESS_SECONDARY_REGION].
ADDRESS_SECONDARY_REGION.name: ADDRESS_SECONDARY_REGION

ADDRESS_STATE.description: Convenience key to use with an address entry in Contacts.Contact . To get the state name in the first address of a Contact.Contact called 'myContact', use myContact.address[0].value[ADDRESS_STATE]. Identical to ADDRESS_PROVINCE.
ADDRESS_STATE.name: ADDRESS_STATE

ADDRESS_STREET_1.description: Convenience key to use with an address entry in Contacts.Contact . To get the first street line in the first address of a Contact.Contact called 'myContact', use myContact.address[0].value[ADDRESS_STREET_1].
ADDRESS_STREET_1.name: ADDRESS_STREET_1

ADDRESS_STREET_2.description: Convenience key to use with an address entry in Contacts.Contact . To get the second street line in the first address of a Contact.Contact called 'myContact', use myContact.address[0].value[ADDRESS_STREET_2].
ADDRESS_STREET_2.name: ADDRESS_STREET_2

ADDRESS_ZIP.description: Convenience key to use with an address entry in Contacts.Contact . To get the zip code in the first address of a Contact.Contact called 'myContact', use myContact.address[0].value[ADDRESS_ZIP]. Identical to ADDRESS_POSTAL_CODE.
ADDRESS_ZIP.name: ADDRESS_ZIP

AnimationStyle.FLIP_FROM_LEFT.description: constant used to describe an animation where the current view flips over with the new view on the opposite side. The leftmost edge is foreground UI.iPhone.AnimationStyle.FLIP_FROM_LEFT is used by UI.currentWindow.showView and UI.UserWindow.showView

AnimationStyle.FLIP_FROM_RIGHT.description: constant used to describe an animation where the current view flips over with the new view on the opposite side. The leftmost edge is foreground UI.iPhone.AnimationStyle.FLIP_FROM_RIGHT is used by UI.currentWindow.showView and UI.UserWindow.showView

RowAnimationStyle.description: Possible transition styles for rows and sections

RowAnimationStyle.BOTTOM.description: constant used to describe a row animation where the inserted row or rows slides in from the bottom; the deleted row or rows slides out toward the bottom.
RowAnimationStyle.BOTTOM.name: RowAnimationStyle.BOTTOM

RowAnimationStyle.FADE.description: constant used to describe a row animation where the inserted or deleted row or rows fades into or out of the table view.
RowAnimationStyle.FADE.name: RowAnimationStyle.FADE

RowAnimationStyle.LEFT.description: constant used to describe a row animation where the nserted row or rows slides in from the left; the deleted row or rows slides out to the left.

RowAnimationStyle.NONE.description: constant used to describe a row replacement where the new cell value appears as if the cell had just been reloaded.. In iPhone OS 2.2.1, this is a fade instead.

RowAnimationStyle.RIGHT.description: constant used to describe a row animation where the inserted row or rows slides in from the right; the deleted row or rows slides out to the right.
